page.title: 11FUND RAISING AYLESTONE HIGH
page.content: Over two hundred runners took part in the Half Marathon and Fun Run organised by Aylestone High School in aid of the Bradford football ground disaster, on the evening of 10.7.85. They expected to raise over Â£3,000. Hereford United Football Club manager Mr. John Newman started the races and presented the awards to the winners. Stewart Little came first in the Half Marathon and Trevor Thomas in the Fun Run. The whole event was computerised to provide each competitor with a certificate giving their finishing position and time for the race. The organisers all agreed that the event was highly successful and hoped that the evening would be repeated annually.
